About

Dr. Yu Bai

Yu B. Associate Professor, California State University, Fullerton

  • Co–Director Intelligent Computing Joint Research Laboratory
  • Email: ybai2 at uci dot edu
  • Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering
  • California State University, Fullerton
  • University of California, Irvine
  • (2016) Ph.D. Electrical Engineering, University of Central Florida
  • (2011) M.S. Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Texas–Pan American
  • (2008) B.S. Electrical Engineering, Ukraine National Aviation University

Dr. Yifeng Yu

Yifeng Y. Professor, University of California, Irvine

  • Co–Director Intelligent Computing Joint Research Laboratory
  • Email: yyu1 at uci dot edu
  • Department of Mathematics
  • University of California, Irvine
  • (2005) Ph.D. Mathematics, University of California, Berkeley
  • (1999) B.S. Mathematics, Nankai University

Awards

  • Dr. Bai received a $190,000 donation to Support Research on Artificial Intelligence in Medical Field, Diversity in STEM
  • Dr. Bai's 'AI–Driven Personalized Learning System' Is a National Academies of Sciences, Engineering and Medicine (NASEM) Winning 'Idea' for Imagining the Future of Undergraduate STEM Education
  • Dr. Bai received $418,675 in funding from Army Research Office to develop an Efficient AI System
  • Dr. Bai received $1.5M in funding from National Science Foundation (NSF) to improve undergraduate STEM Education
